shortdesc.ph: Allows a user to rate a call after the call ends.

p.codeblock: public abstract int rate(String callId, int rating, String description);
abstract rate(callId: string, rating: number, description: string): number;
public abstract int Rate(string callId, int rating, string description);
abstract rate(callId: string, rating: number, description: string): number;
Future<void> rate( {required String callId, required int rating, required String description});

section.note: Ensure that you call this method after leaving a channel.

plentry.pd: The current call ID. You can get the call ID by calling .
The rating of the call. The value is between 1 (lowest score) and 5 (highest score). If you set a value out of this range, the SDK returns the -2 (ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT) error.
(Optional) A description of the call. The string length should be less than 800 bytes.
